name: Carrot Pudding
keywords: bread, carrot, puff pastry, dessert, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 pound home-style white bread, crust removed, torn into small pieces
1/4 to 1/2 cup white wine or sherry

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly butter a 6-8 cup baking dish 2-3 inches deep. If you wish to use the puff pastry base, roll it out a little thinner and place it on the bottom and up the edges of your pan. Refrigerate until ready to use. Mix all remaining ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl. Pour the mixture over the pastry or directly into the prepared pan if no pastry is used. Bake for 1 hour or until pudding appears set in the middle and nicely browned.
